entry.title: Buckner - 360SAX18PG - 1'' Full/Part Circle Brass Impact Sprinkler MPT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Buckner
Type: Impacts
Price: 144.98

Buckner 360SAX18PG - 1'' Full Circle MPT Brass Impact, 23° trajectory, 9/32″ diameter Drive Nozzle with Plugged Filler Nozzle

Ideal for large landscape/ turf irrigation, pastures, logging, mining, waste water treatment, and dust control applications.

Features & Benefits

  • Solid brass construction
  • Stainless steel springs, collars and fulcrum pin
  • “Sure Seal®” sand load bearing assembly
  • Chemical-resistant bearing seals promote longer lifespan
  • Adjustable diffuser pin
  • Over-under nozzles
  • Dual or single nozzle
  • Cast brass trip assembly
  • 23° angle of trajectory

Operating Ranges

U.S.
Pressure: 35 – 100 psi
Flow: 7.75 – 44.01 gpm
Spacing: 49 – 77 feet

Metric
Pressure: 2.41 – 6.89 bars
Flow: 29.36 – 166.58 l/min
Spacing: 14.94 – 23.47 m
Trajectory: 23 Degrees

Specifications
1/2″ male inlet, National Pipe Thread (NPT)                                                                9/32'' Drive Nozzle with Plugged Filler Nozzle

**Model 360SA has been replaced with 360SAX

entry.title: Buckner - 350SAX16PG - 1'' Full Circle Brass Impact Sprinkler MPT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Buckner
Type: Impacts
Price: 124.71

Buckner 350SAX16PG - 1'' Full Circle MPT Brass Impact, 23° trajectory, 1/4″ diameter Drive Nozzle with Plugged Filler Nozzle

Designed for agricultural use in crop irrigation on solid sets, side rolls, and hose reel systems. The Model 350SAX impact sprinkler can also be used in the mining, logging, and waste water treatment industries.

Features & Benefits

  • Solid brass construction
  • Stainless steel springs and fulcrum pin
  • “Sure Seal®” sand load bearing assembly
  • Bearing assembly hood designed to ensure longevity (300SAX)
  • Chemical-resistant bearing seals promote longer lifespan
  • Adjustable diffuser pin
  • Opposing nozzles (300SAX) or over-under nozzles (350SAX)
  • Dual or single nozzle (350SAX)
  • Stream straightening vane standard
  • 23° angle of trajectory

Operating Ranges

U.S.
Pressure: 40 – 80 psi
Flow: 14.61 – 46.59 gpm
Spacing: 47 – 80 feet

Metric
Pressure: 2.76 – 5.52 bars
Flow: 55.3 – 176.96 l/min
Spacing: 14.33 – 24.38 m
Trajectory: 23 Degrees

Specifications
1/2″ male inlet, National Pipe Thread (NPT)                                                                1/4'' Drive Nozzle with Plugged Filler Nozzle

entry.title: Buckner - 2000S10PG - 3/4'' Full Circle Brass Impact Sprinkler MPT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Buckner
Type: Impacts
Price: 40.98

Buckner 2000S10PG - 3/4'' Full Circle MPT Brass Impact, 25° trajectory, 5/32″ diameter Nozzle with Plug in Opposing Nozzle.

Designed for agricultural use in solid sets, hand lines, center pivots, wheel lines, side rolls, crop cooling, frost control, and landscape irrigation situations requiring large area coverage.  The 2000 series can also be used in the mining  and logging industries.

Features & Benefits

  • Solid brass construction
  • Stainless steel springs and fulcrum pin
  • “Sure Seal®” sand load bearing assembly
  • Bearing assembly hood designed to ensure longevity
  • Chemical-resistant bearing seals promote longer lifespan
  • Dual or single nozzle
  • Stream straightening vane optional
  • 25° angle of trajectory

*Use Model 2000S for drive nozzle codes 08, 09,10 and Model 2000SX for 11 and higher

Operating Ranges

U.S.
Pressure: 35 – 80 psi
Flow: 2.53 – 15.71 gpm
Spacing: 40 – 60 feet

Metric
Pressure: 2.41 – 5.52 bars
Flow: 9.52 – 59.52 l/min
Spacing: 12.19 – 18.90 m
Trajectory: 25 Degrees

Specifications
3/4″ male inlet, National Pipe Thread (NPT)
Drive side nozzle 1/4″ – 18 NPT
Range side nozzle PG – Plugged

Literature

2000S Spec Sheet

entry.title: Rain Bird - 65PJ-ADJ-TNT - 1'' FC/PC Brass Impact Sprinkler - FIPT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 189.98

*Product has been discontinued. Please click here for the replacement Impact Sprinkler we have available with similar specs. - Buckner - 360SAX18PG

1" (25 mm) Full or Part Circle, Brass Impact Sprinkler

Has a wide range of applications. Added versatility comes from an adjustable trip slip-pin that converts the sprinkler to full circle applications. The PJ precision jet arm eliminates side splash.

Features

  • 1" (25mm) Female NPT bearing inlet bearing
  • Full or part circle operation
  • "Precision jet" (PJ) arm
  • Stainless steel springs and fulcrum pin
  • Chemically resistant washers
  • ADJ-4 Nozzles include integral break-in pin
  • Full or Part Circle operation
  • Back by five-year Customer Satisfaction Policy
  • For use with Rain Bird ADJN-4 Straight Bore Adjustable Nozzle

Specs

  • Bearing: 1" Female NPT, Brass
  • Trajectory Angle: 27 degrees
  • Operating Range: 50-80 psi (3.5-5.5 bar)
  • Flow Rate: 12.9-16.5 gpm (2.93-3.75 m3/h)
  • Radius: 57-65 ft. (17.4-19.8 m)
  • Nozzle Port: 3/8" Female NPT

entry.title: Rain Bird - 2045A - Maxi-Paw Impact Rotor Pop-Up Sprinkler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 22.08 - 27.40 (2 variants)

The Maxi-Paws powerful throw permits maximum spacing and offers superior close-in watering and uniform water distribution. Low pressure loss and an efficient, straight-through flow design conserve energy and are ideal for dirty water applications.

The optional Seal-A-Matic prevents run-off, puddling, and erosion caused by low head drainage. And most important, its rugged and dependable, popping up on schedule again and again because of the multi-function wiper seal.

***If you need the other nozzles email contact@cheapsprinklers.com. Working on getting the other nozzles added to the site.***

Features

  • Proven impact drive with straight-through flow for superior performance in dirty water.
  • Five standard trajectory and two low angle color-coded nozzles for matched precipitation in a wide range of applications
  • 360° Full-circle OR arc adjustable from 20° to 340°.
  • Side and combination 1/2" or 3/4" bottom inlet for design flexibility.
  • Easy to adjust, easy to service.
  • No tools required to change nozzles.
  • Heavy-duty plastic case with sturdy, reinforced ribbed design.
  • Double-weighted arm for slower rotation and increased distance of throw.
  • Self-flushing inner trip with improved inner trip lever.
  • Powerful reverse action.
  • Adjustable arm spring for low-pressure and low-gallonage operation.
  • Energy efficient, low pressure and low-gallonage operation.
  • Hooded bearing for longer life.
  • Distance control diffuser pin.
  • Multi-function, pressure-activated wiper seal.
  • Inlet filter screen and pressure-activated wiper seal protect internal assembly from debris to ensure positive pop-up and retraction.
  • Heavy-duty, stainless steel retract spring assures positive sprinkler pop-down.
  • Serviceable through the top of the case.
  • Optional internal Seal-A-Matic (SAM) prevents puddling and erosion caused by low head drainage and saves water.
  • Optional nonpotable cover.
  • Three-year trade warranty.

Specs

  • Precipitation Rate: 0.28 to 1.21 inches per hour (7 to 31 mm/h)
  • Radius: 22 to 45 feet (6,7 to 13,7 m)
  • Radius with Radius Reduction Screw: 18 ft (5,4 m)
  • Pressure: 25 to 60 psi (1,7 to 4,1 Bars)
  • Flow: 1.5 to 8.4 GPM (0,34 to 1,91 m3/h; 0,9 to 0,53 l/s)
  • Combination 1/2" (15/21) or 3/4" (20/27) FPT bottom inlet 
    1/2" (15/21) FPT side inlet

Downloads

  • Maxi-Paw 2045A Rotor Impact Sprinkler Tech Spec
  • 2045A Maxi-Paw and Maxi-Paw SAM Nozzles Performance Charts

s:variant.title: 2045A08 | 3'' Adjustable Arc Impact Rotor w/ #08 Nozzle
2045A08-SAM | 3'' Adjustable Arc Impact Rotor w/ Check Valve w/ #08 Nozzle

entry.title: Rain Bird - 14070H - 3/4'' Full Circle Brass Impact Sprinkler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 59.98

*Product has been discontinued. Please click here for the replacement Impact Sprinkler we have available with similar specs. - Buckner - 2000S10PG

3/4" (19mm) Full Circle, Brass Impact Sprinkler

Designed for general use, or for mechanically-moved systems - especially center pivot machines.

Features

  • 3/4" (19mm) male NPT brass inlet bearing
  • Full circle operation with extra large body accommodates wide range of flow rates
  • Long nozzle barrel increases distance of throw
  • Stainless steel springs and fulcrum pin
  • Dual nozzle port for in-close and distance irrigation
  • Back by five-year Customer Satisfaction Policy
  • Pre-Installed with Rain Bird SBN-3 Straight Bore Nozzle or can add SBN-3-V Straight Bore Nozzle with Vane; Spreader nozzle port uses Rain Bird LAN-1-20 or brass plug; all other nozzles sold separately.

Specs

  • Bearing: 3/4" Male NPT, Brass
  • Trajectory Angle: 27 degrees
  • Operating Range: 25-80 psi (1.7-5.5 bar)
  • Flow Rate: 4.2-23 gpm (0.97-5.34 m3/h)
  • Radius: 44-71 ft.(13.57-22.10 m)
  • Nozzle Port: 1/4" Female NPT
  • Spreader Nozzle Port: 1/8" Female NPT

entry.title: Rain Bird - 35A-TNT - 3/4'' FC/PC Brass Impact Sprinkler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 68.98

*Product has been discontinued, please click here for the replacement Impact Sprinkler we have available with similar specs. - Buckner - 261SDX10PG

3/4" (19 mm) Full or Part Circle, Brass Impact Sprinkler

Used in a wide range of applications. Adjustable trip slip pin converts the sprinkler from part circle to full circle operation. Models are available with keyhole, straight bore, adjustable pin and distance control style nozzles.

Used primarily on Row Crops, Field Crops, Wheel Line Systems, Permanent Systems, Solid Systems, and end-of-line/edge-of-field positions.

Features

  • 3/4" (19mm) male NPT brass inlet bearing
  • Full or part circle operation
  • Two sprinkler models available: 35A-PJ includes "Precision Jet" (PJ) arm design, 35A-TNT includes standard style spoon design
  • Heavy duty brass construction
  • Stainless steel springs and fulcrum pin
  • Chemically resistant washers
  • Back by five-year Customer Satisfaction Policy
  • For use with Rain Bird ADJN-3 Nozzle with integral break-up pin, DAN-3 Nozzle with break-up pin and distance flap, or KHN-3 Nozzle with keyhole design

Specs

  • Bearing: 3/4" Male NPT, Brass
  • Trajectory Angle: 27 degrees
  • Operating Range: 30-60 psi (2.1-4.1 bar)
  • Flow Rate: 3.9-7.8 gpm (0.89-1.77 m3/h)
  • Radius: 42-51 ft. (12.8-15.5 m)
  • Nozzle Port: 1/4" Female NPT

Model Comparison

  • 35A-TNT, Item Number A3881012 - Sprinkler with standard style spoon design and with KHN-3 3/16" nozzle
  • 35A-ADJ-TNT, Item Number A3882012 - Sprinkler with standard style spoon design and with ADJN-3 3/16" nozzle
  • 35A-PJ, Item Number A39400 - Sprinkler with Precision Jet (PJ) spoon design, without nozzle
  • 35A-PJ-ADJ-TNT, Item Number A4061312 - Sprinkler with Precision Jet (PJ) spoon design and with ADJN-3 3/16" nozzle
  • 35A-PJ-DA-TNT, Item Number A4061412 - Sprinkler with Precision Jet (PJ) spoon design and with DAN-3 3/16" nozzle

Downloads

﻿Performance Chart

entry.title: Rain Bird - 25-BPJ-FPDA-TNT - 1/2'' FC/PC Brass Impact Sprinkler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 49.98

**Product has been discontinued**

Click here for the replacement Impact Sprinkler we have available with similar specs. - Buckner - 90SD10

1/2" (13mm) Full or Part Circle, Brass Impact Sprinkler

Designed for a variety of uses where full circle sprinklers should not overthrow water into restricted areas. Used for such applications on Orchards, Vineyards, Row Crops, Permanent Systems, Solid Set Systems and for end-of-the line/edge-of-field positions.
  • 1/2 in. (15/21) riser-mounted brass impact head used for slope or large, non-turf-area applications
  • Proven impact drive
  • Straight-through flow for superior performance in dirty water
  • FP trip allows full- or part-circle operation. Adjustable from 20° to 340°
  • Die-cast Precision Jet tube (PJ) minimizes side splash
  • Stainless steel distance control diffusion pin and DA distance control flaps allows up to 25% radius reduction without changing nozzle
  • Rugged brass, bronze, and stainless steel construction
  • Bronze body and arm, stainless steel trip assembly, brass bearing sleeve and nipple
  • Stainless steel fulcrum pin, arm spring, trip spring and friction collars

Specs

  • Bearing: 1/2" Male NPT, Brass
  • Trajectory Angle: 25 degrees
  • Operating Range: 30-50 psi (2.1-3.5 bar)
  • Precipitation Rate: 0.41 to 0.66 inches per hour (10 to 17 mm/h)
  • Flow Rate: 3.1-5.0 gpm (0.7-1.14 m3/h)
  • Radius: 38-41 ft. (11.6-12.5 m)
  • Nozzle Port: 1/8 Female NPT

Manuals & Literature

  • Performance Chart, 25BPJ
  • Parts Guide, 25BPJ

entry.title: Rain Bird - 2045PJ - 1/2'' Maxibird Impact Sprinkler w/ Blue #08 Nozzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rain Bird
Type: Impacts
Price: 13.25

Rain Bird 2045-PJ Maxi-Bird Impact Rotor

Dirty Water Applications - Spacing Up to 45 Feet (13.7 m)

Designed for a variety of uses where full circle sprinklers should not overthrow water into restricted areas. The body, arm, bearing sleeve and nipple are made of durable Delrin plastic.

***This will not fit into the 2045a Maxi-Paw can. It is a completely different head. It is not compatible with the 42064 Maxi-Paw Wrench***

Features / Benefits

  • Includes blue #08 standard angle nozzle preinstalled.
    • If you need other nozzles please include in notes when ordering or email contact@cheapsprinklers.com.
  • Proven impact drive.
  • Straight-through flow for superior performance in dirty water.
  • Easy to adjust; easy to service.
  • Double-weighted arm for slower rotation and increased distance of throw.
  • Powerful reverse action.
  • Adjustable arm spring for low-pressure and low-gallonage operation.
  • Full-circle or part-circle arc 20 degrees to 340 degrees.
  • Precision Jet tube (PJ) minimizes side splash.
  • Hooded bearing for longer life.
  • Distance control diffuser pin allows up to 25% radius reduction without changing nozzles.
  • FP trip for full- or part-circle operation.

Specs

  • Precipitation Rate: 0.28 to 0.92 inches per hour (7 to 24 mm/h)
  • Radius: 22 to 45 feet (6;7 to 13;7 m)
  • Radius with Radius Reduction Screw: 18 feet (5;4 m)
  • Pressure: 25 to 60 psi (1;7 to 4;1 Bars)
  • Flow: 1.5 to 8.4 GPM (0;34 to 1;91 m3/h; 0;09 to 0;53 l/s)
  • 1/2" (15/21) male threaded inlet 
  • For 08 nozzle; highest point of stream is 6 feet (1;8 m) above grade.
